I couldn't be happier with my daughter's experience at Elim Charis Montessori. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with warmth and enthusiasm from the staff. The environment is bright, cheerful, and filled with stimulating activities that keep the children engaged and excited to learn.

All staff and teachers are very detailed, attentioned and taking care of children since day one. My daughter adapted really well (her first experience) in a very short timeframe thanks to the guidance and caring during the first days of her teachers and staff.

As a parent it gave me also a lot of calm and comfort the follow up provided by the teachers through their app so we knew on a daily basis how my daughter was doing and her adaptation and activities she carried out. Also teachers and staff were very responsive to our questions and queries on how she evolved.

Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend Elim Charis Montessori to any parent looking for a nurturing and enriching early childhood education program. My daughter is now looking forward to going to school every day, and as a parent, that peace of mind is priceless.

My son have been with charis since he is in PG. His teachers are passionate in nurturing and motivating him. I really appreciate the constant updates of his development by his teachers through the app or during pick up. I also want to thank all the staff for being supportive and taking good care of my son's needs.

My both daughters are part of Charis. My elder one needed special attention which is very much being taken care. Special thanks to the teachers. My younger one learning and developing well as per her age. School also keep a good balanace between Montessori and regular required learnings. Hope the school always shines along with happier kids and parents.
Me and my girl love the school! Great school programme. Very responsible and loving teachers. Always feel very blessed to have chosen this school for my girl!
I would absolutely recommend Elim Charis Montessori to any parent!! Caring and dedicated staff. Wonderfully built program that includes play based learning for kids
